Moxin's Vision

We believe in a future where AI is open, accessible, and sovereign. Our mission is to build the fundamental infrastructure that empowers everyone to create, deploy, and own their intelligence.

Open First

We are committed to advancing the state of the art in AI through open research. From novel architectures to efficient inference techniques, we publish our findings and code for the community.

Modular Ecosystem

The future of AI is composable. We build modular componentsâ€”from models to agents to inference enginesâ€”that developers can mix and match to create powerful, custom solutions.
